Html:
Hi

I'm tring to receive a shadow on a box with an transparency below 1.0, does somebody has done this befor? I'am using Goblin XNA 3.4

thanks for your replys!

Chris

We don't support shadow rendering on semi-transparent objects because it's more complicated to cast shadows correctly through semi-transparent objects. If you want to have that kind of behavior, you need to implement your own shader.

Ohan
